features.title: Features
features.description: Select the feature(s) included in the offer of your solution depending on the production context. It must be inherent in at least 1 of the 4 production contexts

items.default: Automate the process of goods quality control and digitize it

oneOf.const: Automate the process of goods quality control and digitize it
oneOf.title: Automate the process of goods quality control and digitize it

oneOf.const: Provide a digital library of tipical errors/faults and product quality issues for each quality criticalities
oneOf.title: Provide a digital library of tipical errors/faults and product quality issues for each quality criticalities

oneOf.const: Provide lists of possible reworking interventions for identified product quality issues
oneOf.title: Provide lists of possible reworking interventions for identified product quality issues

oneOf.const: Provide root cause analysis of product quality defects
oneOf.title: Provide root cause analysis of product quality defects

oneOf.const: Provide root cause analysis of problems in the product quality control process
oneOf.title: Provide root cause analysis of problems in the product quality control process

oneOf.const: Provide list of  possible rectification instructions to solve, mitigate, and/or prevent quality criticalities
oneOf.title: Provide list of  possible rectification instructions to solve, mitigate, and/or prevent quality criticalities

items.default: Monitor shop flor environment conditions in real-time and provide alerts and feedback

oneOf.const: Monitor shop flor environment conditions in real-time and provide alerts and feedback
oneOf.title: Monitor shop flor environment conditions in real-time and provide alerts and feedback

oneOf.const: Monitor worker wellbeing status in real-time and provide alerts or ergonomic feedback
oneOf.title: Monitor worker wellbeing status in real-time and provide alerts or ergonomic feedback

oneOf.const: Monitor machine status and operation in real-time and provide safety alerts
oneOf.title: Monitor machine status and operation in real-time and provide safety alerts

oneOf.const: Provide real-time alerts, notifications and feedbacks to operators during task procedures
oneOf.title: Provide real-time alerts, notifications and feedbacks to operators during task procedures

oneOf.const: Automate routine and physically demanding tasks for workers
oneOf.title: Automate routine and physically demanding tasks for workers

oneOf.const: Evaluate employee performance and provide AR training and assistance for tasks
oneOf.title: Evaluate employee performance and provide AR training and assistance for tasks

oneOf.const: Predict when machines will need maintenance or repair based on performance and historical data
oneOf.title: Predict when machines will need maintenance or repair based on performance and historical data

oneOf.const: Monitor machine performance and resource consumption in real-time
oneOf.title: Monitor machine performance and resource consumption in real-time

oneOf.const: Provide real-time alerts, notifications and feedbacks on anomalies, unexpected events or unusual patterns in machine performance data that may indicate a problem
oneOf.title: Provide real-time alerts, notifications and feedbacks on anomalies, unexpected events or unusual patterns in machine performance data that may indicate a problem

oneOf.const: Identify the cause of malfunctions in machines
oneOf.title: Identify the cause of malfunctions in machines

oneOf.const: Provide lists of insights, recommendations and intervention options for machine settings
oneOf.title: Provide lists of insights, recommendations and intervention options for machine settings

items.default: Monitor production data of the worker-factory ecosystem in real-time, such as machine sensor readings

oneOf.const: Monitor production data of the worker-factory ecosystem in real-time, such as machine sensor readings
oneOf.title: Monitor production data of the worker-factory ecosystem in real-time, such as machine sensor readings

oneOf.const: Monitor production metrics in real-time, such as output per hour, scrap rate, or downtime.
oneOf.title: Monitor production metrics in real-time, such as output per hour, scrap rate, or downtime.

oneOf.const: Identify and analyze root causes of capacity constraints and production bottlenecks
oneOf.title: Identify and analyze root causes of capacity constraints and production bottlenecks

oneOf.const: Provide lists of insights, recommendations, and interventions to schedule machine and human resources and assign taks
oneOf.title: Provide lists of insights, recommendations, and interventions to schedule machine and human resources and assign taks

oneOf.const: Provide lists of insights, recommendations, and interventions to manage existing production capacity
oneOf.title: Provide lists of insights, recommendations, and interventions to manage existing production capacity

oneOf.const: Simulate processes for virtual process planning and/or scheduling
oneOf.title: Simulate processes for virtual process planning and/or scheduling

oneOf.const: Automate job scheduling of human and machine resources
oneOf.title: Automate job scheduling of human and machine resources

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.description: Select the main benefit(s) end users will get from your solution. It must be inherent in at least 1 of the 4 production contexts

Improve the overall Quality of the Produ.title: Improve the overall Quality of the Product

Improve protection of the physical state.title: Improve protection of the physical state of the worker

Optimize exploitation and management of.title: Optimize exploitation and management of the mental capacities of the worker

Improve the level of protection and safe.title: Improve the level of protection and safety in the workplace

Optimize exploitation and management of.title: Optimize exploitation and management of production machines uptime

Optimize efficiency & effectiveness of t.title: Optimize efficiency & effectiveness of the predictive maintenance process

Improve the overall system production ef.title: Improve the overall system production efficiency and flexibility

Optimize efficiency and effectiveness of.title: Optimize efficiency and effectiveness of production management processes
